name: EDITAG
goal:
EDITAG, a leading manufacturer of IoT solution, designs and offers turnkey solutions based on innovative wireless sensors (mOOnTAG® hybrid and modular technology) for hyperlocalization and real-time supervision.
We ensure highest reliability for mission critical business and secuirty applications and has already implemented on an international scale its turn-key solutions in logistics, automotive, railway, manufacturing, luxury goods industrial as well as in major cultural institutions such as museums and art fondations.
euInitiatives: Participation to the Technical Committee CEN/TC 346 “Conservation of Cultural Heritage”, the secretariat of which is held by UNI.e Europenan group working through the french group driven by AFNOPR and preparing the document EN 15999 under the general title "Conservation of cultural heritage – Guidelines for design of showcases for exhibition and preservation of objects
